title: [DVD9 ENG-ITA]Pearl Harbor (bySPG)[UF]
description:
[DVD9 ENG-ITA]Pearl Harbor (bySPG)[UF]

---------------------------------------------------------------------

Director:         Michael Bay
Writer (WGA):     Randall Wallace (written by)
Release Date:     1 June 2001 (Italy)
Genre:            Action | Romance | War

Plot:             Pearl Harbor follows the story of two best friends,
                  Rafe and Danny, and their love lives as they go off
                  to join the war.



Awards:           Won Oscar. Another 9 wins & 34 nominations


Cast:	Ben Affleck	... 	Capt. Rafe McCawley

	Josh Hartnett	... 	Capt. Danny Walker

	Kate Beckinsale	... 	Nurse Lt. Evelyn Johnson

	Cuba Gooding Jr.	... 	Petty Officer Doris Miller

	Jon Voight	... 	President Franklin Delano Roosevelt

	Alec Baldwin	... 	Lt. Col. James Doolittle

	Tom Sizemore	... 	Sgt. Earl Sistern

	William Lee Scott	... 	Lt. Billy Thompson
	Greg Zola	... 	Lt. Anthony Fusco

	Ewen Bremner	... 	Lt. Red Winkle

	Jaime King	... 	Nurse Betty Bayer (as James King)
	Catherine Kellner	... 	Nurse Barbara

	Jennifer Garner	... 	Nurse Sandra

	Sara Rue	... 	Nurse Martha

	Michael Shannon	... 	Lt. Gooz Wood
